solution_line_template: Every day, in addition to her {normal_work_hours}-hour work schedule, Anie needs {extra_hours} extra hours, which means she works {normal_work_hours}+{extra_hours}= <<{normal_work_hours}+{extra_hours}={total_daily_hours}>>{total_daily_hours} hours each day.

If the project is estimated to take {project_total_hours} hours, Anie will need to work for {project_total_hours}/{total_daily_hours} = <<{project_total_hours}/{total_daily_hours}={days_to_finish}>>{days_to_finish} days to complete the project.
